DOC.brief_summary: This study compares the effect of nebulized lidocaine and lidocaine spray in patients undergoing esophago-gastro-duodenoscopy. The investigators evaluate the success rate of the procedure between two methods.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Topical and Nebulized Anesthesia in Patients Undergoing Esophago-Gastro-Duodenoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: This is a randomized-controlled trial in the patients undergoing esophago-gastro-duodenoscopy. The patients are randomized by computer into two arms: nebulized lidocaine and lidocaine spray. Both drugs are applied 15-20 minutes prior the prior the procedure. Only one endoscopist participate in this study. After the procedure finishes, the investigators evaluate the outcome and satisfaction of patients and endoscopist.
